content: 2011 Singaporean film ***Echoing Love*** ([Chinese](/wiki/Chinese_language): 爱情六重奏), is a 2011 Singaporean anthology film directed by [Edmund Chen](/wiki/Edmund_Chen), [Xiang Yun](/wiki/Xiang_Yun), Erica Lee, [Vincent Ng](/wiki/Vincent_Ng), [Nathaniel Ho](/wiki/Nathaniel_Ho) and [Alaric Tay](/wiki/Alaric_Tay). The film won the Special Achievement award at the 2011 [Singapore International Film Festival](/wiki/Singapore_International_Film_Festival). ## Cast - [Huang Yiliang](/wiki/Huang_Yiliang) - [Xiang Yun](/wiki/Xiang_Yun) - [Chen Xi](/wiki/Chen_Xi_(actor)) - [Chen Yixin](/wiki/Chen_Yixin_(actress)) - [Alaric Tay](/wiki/Alaric_Tay) - [Vincent Ng](/wiki/Vincent_Ng) - Jiu Jian - Lai Meiqi - [Ezann Lee](/wiki/Ezann_Lee) ## Release The film was screened at the 2011 [Singapore International Film Festival](/wiki/Singapore_International_Film_Festival) and the fifth International Chinese Film Festival in [Sydney](/wiki/Sydney). It did not receive a theatrical release. - *Echoing Love* at [IMDb](/wiki/IMDb_(identifier)) This article related to a Singaporean film is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Echoing Love
